Class ReviewService

java.lang.Object
com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.services.ReviewService
public class ReviewService extends Object
The ReviewService class provides methods for interacting with review-related data and functionality.

    • getReviewsByFilmId

      public ArrayList<Review> getReviewsByFilmId(Integer idFilm) throws ServiceException
      Retrieves a list of reviews for a specific film ID.

      idFilm - the ID of the film
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Review objects
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs while retrieving the reviews

    • addReview

      public void addReview(Integer idFilm, String username, Integer rating, String description) throws ServiceException
      Adds a review for a film.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film
      username - the username of the reviewer
      rating - the rating given by the reviewer
      description - the description of the review
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs while adding the review

    • deleteReviewById

      public void deleteReviewById(Integer idReview) throws ServiceException
      Deletes a review by its ID.
      Parameters:
      idReview - the ID of the review
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs while deleting the review

    • updateReviewById

      public void updateReviewById(Integer idReview, Integer rating, String description) throws ServiceException
      Updates the rating and description of a review by its ID.
      Parameters:
      idReview - the ID of the review
      rating - the new rating
      description - the new description
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs while updating the review
